name: @goondan/sample-3-multi-agent
description: Goondan Sample 3: 멀티 에이전트 Telegram 봇

scripts.build:yaml: mkdir -p dist/tools/delegate dist/tools/code dist/tools/git dist/connectors/telegram && cp src/tools/delegate/tool.yaml dist/tools/delegate/ && cp src/tools/code/tool.yaml dist/tools/code/ && cp src/tools/git/tool.yaml dist/tools/git/ && cp src/connectors/telegram/connector.yaml dist/connectors/telegram/
